scaffold - enhanced models.from sentence: We observe that our scaffold - enhanced models achieve clear improvements over the state - of - the - art approach on this task .

results.from sentence: Generally we observe that results on categories with more number of instances are higher .

BiLSTM - Attn.from sentence: Starting with the ' BiLSTM - Attn ' baseline with a macro F1 score of 51.8 , adding the first scaffold task in ' BiLSTM - Attn + section title scaffold ' improves the F1 score to 56.9 (?= 5.1 ) .

second scaffold.from sentence: Adding the second scaffold in ' BiLSTM - Attn + citation worthiness scaffold ' also results in similar improvements : 56.3 (?= 4.5 ) .

both scaffolds.from sentence: Adding both scaffolds results in further improvements .

When both scaffolds are used simultaneously in ' BiLSTM - Attn + both scaffolds ' , the F1 score further improves to 63.1 ( ?= 11.3 ) , suggesting that the two tasks provide complementary signal that is useful for citation intent prediction .

input representations.in: BiLSTM - Attn w / ELMo + both scaffolds

add.from sentence: The best result is achieved when we also add ELMo vectors to the input representations in ' BiLSTM - Attn w / ELMo + both scaffolds ' , achieving an F1 of 67.9 , a major improvement from the previous state - of - the - art results of 54.6 ( ?= 13.3 ) .

by using.from sentence: And the best results are obtained by using ELMo representation in addition to both scaffolds .

Each scaffold task.from sentence: Each scaffold task improves model performance .

scaffold tasks.from sentence: We note that the scaffold tasks provide major contributions on top of the ELMo - enabled baseline ( ?= 13.6 ) , demonstrating the efficacy of using structural scaffolds for citation intent prediction .

experimented with.from sentence: We also experimented with adding features used in to our best model and not only we did not see any improvements , but we observed at least 1.7 % decline in performance .

BACKGROUND category.from sentence: For example on ACL - ARC , the results on the BACKGROUND category are the highest as this category is the most common .

are.from sentence: Conversely , the results on the FUTUREWORK category are the lowest .

fewest data points.from sentence: This category has the fewest data points ( see distribution of the categories in ) and thus it is harder for the model to learn the optimal parameters for correct classification in this category .
